alert.note: Alert for Rio Grande Valley of Eastern Hudspeth County; Salt Basin; Southern Hudspeth Highlands (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Freezing Fog Advisory issued February 02 at 8:15AM CST until February 02 at 11:00AM CST by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...FREEZING FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM MST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Visibility at or below 1/4 mile in fog and freezing fog. * WHERE...Portions of Hudspeth county. * WHEN...Until 10 AM Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...Hazardous travel will be possible due to the combination of low visibility and potentially slick roadways.
info.instruction: A Freezing Fog Advisory means visibilities will frequently be reduced to less than one quarter mile. If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you. Also, be alert for frost on bridge decks causing slippery roads.

area.areaDesc: Rio Grande Valley of Eastern Hudspeth County; Salt Basin; Southern Hudspeth Highlands
